response.job_title: Digital Project Director at Gradiweb - Web Agency
response.summary: An Industrial Engineer from the National University of Colombia with a double bachelor and a masters degree in innovation and project management at the ENSGSI of France. Praised for the ability to take the time to understand the problem before using global scientific knowledge to construct a solution. Possess comprehensive knowledge of data analytics (Power Pivot, R and Tableau), and good communication skills in French and English. During my masters research project, I developed a theoretical framework on competence development for the middle management of a design organization and during my internship at Enel, I performed an exploratory data analysis to understand data behavior and improve the decision making process of talent development and training.
response.skills: Industrial Engineering, Project Management, Microsoft Office, Knowledge Management, Lean Management, Production Management, Change Management, E-Learning, Logistics, Supply Chain Management, Marketing, Simulations, Statistics, Data Analysis, Product Management, Business Development, Business Process Improvement, Business Analysis, Product management, User experience

company.name: Ministerio de Ciencia, Tecnología e Innovación

profile_positions.description: Lead of the financial and technical monitoring and evaluation of projects implemented in the innovation strategies of Minciencias with enterprises (Big and SME).
profile_positions.title: Project Management Professional

profile_positions.description: Leading digital initiatives in order to improve efficiency, customer experience, also automate performance and financial reports.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: From the Service innovation team, I execute some projects to improve the patients' experience of strategic areas at the hospital by applying the Design Thinking methodology. We Collaborate with different departments to re-design critical business processes and systems to improve internal efficiency and the patients’ experience. We make use of the design thinking framework supported by process analysis methods like process mining, business process management, and Business Analytics.
profile_positions.title: Professional in Management of Service Processes

profile_positions.description:
Support the training and development activities in Colombia. 
Help managers during the annual evaluation process and consolidate the results of their collaborators.
Participate in the design, planning, and execution of the training programs in Colombia.
profile_positions.title: Intern HR Development

profile_positions.description: As an intern of the Innovation and performance management team of the Engineering Department of Essilor, I was in charge of deploying a knowledge management strategy for the engineering department, offering support on critical capitalization projects and proposing knowledge capture tools implementation and improvement with the teams.
profile_positions.title: Knowledge Management Intern

profile_positions.description: During a whole semester some students can support a course 6 hours per week doing a variety of activities, such as administrative tasks and fellow students orientation. In this case I supported the project management course in the engineering faculty.
profile_positions.title: Academic Assistant

profile_positions.description: Bibliographic revision of theories, principles and practices of Living Labs in Europe and in Colombia. Support the events organised by the ViveLab as an innovation laboratory.
profile_positions.title: Intern

profile_positions.description: Costumer service and promotion of products of the TracFone Inc. account as a Tier 1 agent in English and Spanish. Customers from all around the US.
profile_positions.title: Bilingual customer support

company.name: Gradiweb - Web Agency
company.description:
Want to attract your target audience and increase the number of your happy clients?

We create digital marketing strategies that do just that. 

Our digital marketing strategies work as a guide through the sales funnel. They take your targets by the hand and lead them through all the stations of the funnel. The final destination is where they convert into  happy clients and brand promoters. 

We tailor our strategies to each of our client's audience and objectives. They might consist of some or all of the following components: 

- Branding
- Website Design
- E-commerce and Marketplace
- Landing pages for ad campaigns
- Content Marketing & Lead Nurturing (creation of different content types for each station of the sales funnel: blog posts, infographics, ebooks, white papers, presentations etc.)
- Social Media Marketing
- Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
- Influencer Marketing
- Link Building Strategies
- Email Marketing
- Search Engine Marketing (SEM)

Are you ready to watch your reputation and sales climb up? We are! Get in touch!
